Package nl.uu.cs.aplib.mainConcepts

Class Tactic.PrimitiveTactic

java.lang.Object
nl.uu.cs.aplib.mainConcepts.Tactic
nl.uu.cs.aplib.mainConcepts.Tactic.PrimitiveTactic
Enclosing class:
Tactic
public static class Tactic.PrimitiveTactic extends Tactic
A subclass of Tactic representing a single Action. It bassically just wraps the Action.

  • Method Details

    • on_

      public <AgentSt> Tactic.PrimitiveTactic on_​(Predicate<AgentSt> guard)
      Set the given predicate as the guard of the Action that underlies this PrimitiveTactic. The method returns this instance of PrimitiveTactic so that it can be used in the Fluent Interface style.
